thread.section_title: Dior US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dior US | dior-us.com | 2 of 86
thread.title: Rosary

author: Rosary
title: Rosary
text: The customer service is exceptional, and I was able to find exactly what I was looking for online without having to browse through a lot of other items. My merchandise arrived within a few days beautifully packaged and delivered with care, not just thrown in a box. Dior has made me feel important and appreciated and I am forever thankful. Sometimes it's the small things that count. I love their products and will be a loyal customer for life. Thank you Dior
